code: import{useEffect}from'react';import{useDispatch,useSelector}from'react-redux';import{fetchActivities,deleteActivityAPI}from'../features/activitySlice';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ActivityList(){const dispatch=useDispatch();const list=useSelector(state=>state.activities.list);useEffect(()=>{dispatch(fetchActivities());},[dispatch]);const handleDelete=async id=>{dispatch(deleteActivityAPI(id));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Activity List"}),list.map(act=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{border:'1px solid #ccc',margin:'10px',padding:'10px'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:act.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:act.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:act.date}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/edit/".concat(act._id),children:"Edit"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>handleDelete(act._id),children:"Delete"})]},act._id))]});}export default ActivityList;
